section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, the Commission may impose a civil penalty not exceeding $25,000 against a person who violates a provision of this division, or an effective and outstanding direction, ruling, order, rule, or regulation of the Commission.
The civil penalty that the Commission may impose on a common carrier for each violation may not exceed $2,500.
A civil penalty may be imposed in addition to any other penalty authorized by this division.
Each violation is a separate offense.
Each day or part of a day the violation continues is a separate offense.

text.section: A civil penalty collected under this section shall be paid into the General Fund of the State.
